root.name: Capcom Classics Collection: Volume 2
root.description: Overview A compilation of 20 classic Capcom games released for the PS2 and Xbox in 2006, developed by Backbone Entertainment. It is a follow up to the first volume.Games 1941: Counter Attack Avengers Black Tiger Block Block Captain Commando Eco Fighters King of Dragons Knights of the Round Last Duel Magic Sword Mega Twins Quiz Dragons Side Arms Hyper Dyne The Speed Rumbler Street Fighter Strider Super Street Fighter II Turbo Three Wonders Tiger Road Varth: Operation Thunderstorm
